description.long_description: Utility for finding suitable helicopter landing zones surrounding a speciflzied target location.

dem.description: Optional DEM file to use in lieu of default elevation database.

gsd.description: Product resolution in meters-per-pixel. Defaults to the best resolution of elevation files referenced.

lut.description: Specifies the optional lookup table filename for mapping the single-band output image to an RGB. The LUT provided must be in the ossimIndexToRgbLutFilter format and must handle the three output viewshed values (see --values option).

point_cloud.description: Specifies ancillary point-cloud data for level-2 search for obstructions.

reticle.description: Size (in pixels) of reticle centered on observer's position. If non-zero, a border is drawn delineating the ROI.

roi.description: Radius of interest surrounding the target (meters)

roughness.description: Threshold for acceptable landing zone terrain roughness (meters).

slope.description: Threshold for acceptable landing zone terrain slope (deg).

threat-domes.description: Optional file containing threat dome specifications.

viewsheds.description: Optional file containing specifications of observers used in identifying visible or hidden LZs.

bad_zone_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing unsuitable terrain.

marginal_zone_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing marginal terrain.

good_zone_index.description: Specifies the pixel values (0-255) for the pixels representing good terrain.

outputFile.description: The URL/filename of the WMS server where the file is now accessible
